snippet: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas, accused of using his veto power to pressure Austin’s top prosecutor to step down, said, “I would make exactly the same decision.” He also said President Obama was responsible for a national erosion of the “rule of...
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas, accused of using his veto power to pressure Austin’s top prosecutor to step down, said, “I would make exactly the same decision.” He also said President Obama was responsible for a national erosion of the “rule of law.”

headline.main: In Wake of Indictment, Perry Defends Veto (and Criticizes Obama)
